dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: A suite of 57 Atari 2600 games used for evaluating reinforcement learning algorithms. The games are implemented within the Arcade Learning Environment (ALE), providing a standard benchmark for RL research.
dcterms:title: Atari 2600 Games Dataset
